entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
